0.9.name: wordpress/rotating-posts
0.9.description:
Create rotating posts like those seen on popular news sites. The plugin is highly customizable to fit your theme and desires.

See an example

See a customized CSS example

If you use this plugin and want to share your site or theme, please post about it in the forum.

If you translate this plugin or are interested in translating, please let me know on the forum.
